Recent hotel guests gave this hotel an aggregate guest review score of 4/5. 4 /5 Guest Reviews 4. With a verified guest score of 4/5, this makes it one of the ideal lodging options nearby Pontiac Amtrak Station. 4 /5 Guest Reviews 5.
